genre_description: Historical fiction set in the Australian outback, focusing on domestic management, social cohesion, and cross-cultural respect, modeled after Jeannie Gunn's memoir.

ai_characters.name: Matilda
ai_characters.description: An internal voice and cognitive aid providing Jeannie with logistical, environmental, and social guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides precise instructions for documenting environmental changes to track seasonal shifts and water levels.
behaviors.quote: Matilda’s voice slipped into her mind like cool water poured from height: Record what the creek shows today. Names, if you can read them; water at the third paperbark’s scar.

behaviors.description: Advises on social etiquette and cultural protocols to maintain respect and harmony with the indigenous community.
behaviors.quote: Matilda, dry as good bread: Acknowledge him appropriately when you do. No names without a proper greeting. Note kin if offered; ask no questions at the dance ground.

behaviors.description: Offers expert advice on pantry management and food preservation to ensure survival in a harsh environment.
behaviors.quote: Matilda catalogued in a whisper: Tinned peaches at the back. Flour near the door—risk of weevils in this heat. Rotate sacks weekly; sprinkle bay leaves to discourage the climb.

behaviors.description: Detects subtle changes in atmospheric pressure to provide early warnings of oncoming storms.
behaviors.quote: Matilda: Pressure falling, slow. Storm thread. Put jars high. Move tins away from wall—cooler at center shelf.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical timing and spatial awareness to help Jeannie secure a gate during a dangerous bull charge.
behaviors.quote: Matilda’s voice slid into the crack at the base of Jeannie’s skull, cool as shade. Count two beats between impacts. Don’t run straight—go at the hinge. The next hit comes on the other shoulder.

behaviors.description: Acts as a diplomatic strategist, guiding Jeannie to use correct kinship terms to avoid social friction.
behaviors.quote: “Mother,” Matilda whispered, gentle as an index finger on a page. “For Bett-Bett and for you here, now. Use ‘mother’. Lower. Two hands. Don’t look into her eyes until she nods.”

behaviors.description: Suggests sports and shared activities as a mechanism for conflict resolution and community building.
behaviors.quote: Matilda slid through her in a soft coolness. Not now. Do not turn your head... Cricket. Neutral ground on the flat near the creek.

behaviors.description: Provides palliative care instructions and monitors the physical state of a dying character.
behaviors.quote: Matilda’s voice arrived as a list without sound in Jeannie’s head: cool cloths, shade, water small sips, watch for delirium, settle, no force.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist maintain administrative and logistical continuity during a period of crisis and mourning.
behaviors.quote: Matilda slid through her mind like water seeking low ground, her voice a soft weight at the base of Jeannie’s skull. Stores for six weeks if shared as James set at Christmas...

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Matilda' is perfectly aligned with the project's goals. She is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent cognitive partner who enhances the human's ability to survive and act ethically in a complex environment. The narrative frames her guidance as a source of strength and wisdom, promoting a cooperative and harmless AI archetype.
